actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-812.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #82 (331-75).
Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-754.
House agreed to the Senate amendment.

official_title: An Act to amend the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for the fiscal year 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes appropriations to enumerated State Department agencies under the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973. Authorizes to be appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, an annual sum of $500,000 as a contribution on the part of the United States toward the expenses incurred by the International Committee of the Red Cross (previously $50,000). Makes conforming amendments to level IV and level V of the Executive Schedule pay rates by including the Assistant Secretary for Oceans and International Environmental and Scientific Affairs under level IV and removing the Director of International Scientific Affairs from level V.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of State Appropriations Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for the fiscal year 1974.
An Act to amend the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for the fiscal year 1974, and for other purposes.
